channel.title: zfs on Web Book
channel.description: Recent content in zfs on Web Book

item.title: An End of Disk Issues?
item.description: I have a workstation that I have built, it contains a multi-disk Large Form Factor ZFS array. There have been multiple posts in the past about some of my disk related problems that I’ve handled, you should be able to find them with a ‘zfs’ or ‘disk’ tag. Well I had several issues, that I hope should be calming down; going back to January, where I decided to move from 4x3TB RAID-Z (software RAID 5) to 4x4TB 7200RPM RAID 10 setup.
